data.title: Kris ends marriage with James
data.meta_description: THE Queen of Talk Kris Aquino finally broke her silence on the status of her marriage with cager James Yap, saying "With finality, I can say na ako ay sumu
data.text:
THE Queen of Talk Kris Aquino finally broke her silence on the status of her marriage with cager James Yap, saying "With finality, I can say na ako ay sumuko na."

The TV-host actress said they gave their hardest to work on what's left with their relationship but the gaps were too many that it just didn't work out.

She said it wasn't just a spur of the moment decision but they really tried to save the marriage.

Kris refused to give more details on the split-up and will remain quiet on her family life, not because of brother President-elect Benigno "Noynoy" Aquino III, but because of her son Baby James.

"I know that I will leave so many unanswered questions, but my decision to keep quiet is because of my son."

Her three sisters and Noynoy himself also extended help to save the marriage but Kris said that it is beyond repair.

She added that there is already an ongoing talks on the legal aspect of her marriage.

Kris and James were married last July 10, 2005 and she gave birth to their first child on April 17, 2008.
